description.value:
You gain one of the following feature options of your choice. Whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can replace the chosen option with another one.

Predacious Evasion. You have Advantage on saving throws against spells, unless you have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition. If the spell allows you to make a saving throw to take only half damage you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half the damage if you fail.

Stand Against the Tide. When you are adjacent to more than one enemy, you have Resistance to the damage those enemies deal.

Undaunting. While you have more than 0 Hit Points, you cannot have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition unless you choose to.
